html:
6.18.19  2:34 am   do you think people will ever stop asking you when the next video will be out?

     most of them will stop when it's released, and a few will continue as a joke. and then as a bit more time goes by they will start asking when the next one will be out

6.18.19  2:21 am   is the new video you're doing extremely long ?

     no

      or are you just incredibly busy ?

     i am busy working on it

      either way, i'm sure i'll like it, take your time and can't wait to see it

6.18.19  1:55 am   why is velcro

     astronauts

6.18.19  1:38 am   when was the last time you had watermelon?

     must have been the high middle ages

6.18.19  12:52 am   hey bill, do you think the video will be done by the end of this month?

     i don't know

      can't wait to see it

6.17.19  11:33 pm   have you ever invented a universe

     possibly without knowing it

6.17.19  10:09 pm   do you ever just play chess or go?

     i usually leave that up to computers

6.17.19  9:52 pm   Are you still a piece of garbage 

     never was. i'm the entire garbage

6.17.19  9:01 pm   what is your opinion on global warming

     it is the perfect solution to global cooling

6.17.19  8:59 pm   Can you use a different font than Times New Roman?

     i usually do

      It's overused and boring.

     the only time i start using it is when i feel i have under used it

      And I don't believe you don't want to be repetitive and boring. I personally like Georgia and Caslon.

If you want to be really out there, use some fantasy font like Isabella, etc.

     i've used hundreds of fonts

6.17.19  8:33 pm   Are you reasonably not sad with your day to day activities?

     i am reasonably sad, happy, and more

6.17.19  7:04 pm   Do keyframes default to smooth in your regular video editing program?

     no but my regular video editing program is also dead

6.17.19  6:19 pm   What do you think about cacti?

     i miss them. #bringthemback

6.17.19  5:00 pm   got any clues for solving abiogenesis?

     already was solved. what i don't know is how they did it

6.17.19  4:00 pm   When will you realease your next song?!!!!

     as soon as i finish the video for it

6.17.19  3:04 pm   Congratulations, bill, your efforts have paid off: things have now been made right. You can now move on to making things a different way.

     the joke's on me. things already were right

6.17.19  1:43 pm   Would you enjoy to see the creation of all noodles, in one place, simultaneously?

     no, that sounds too intense

6.17.19  1:38 pm   can you go to the dinner dance with me please

     i prefer the dance dinner

6.17.19  1:09 pm   How does Life work?

     i'm trying to explain

6.17.19  12:53 pm   if you covered a song would you consider changing some lyrics?

     i've always considered changing 5 to 95 % of lyrics (and music) in cover songs. however in recent years i have begun to think that this may be legally complicated in some way

6.17.19  12:12 pm   Is being on YouTube stressful?

     yes but fortunately usually i am not on youtube, it's just recordings of me

6.17.19  10:28 am   What are pineapples? 

     scientists are trying to figure out

6.17.19  10:01 am   whats the latest mixing trick you've discovered

     a better arrangement

6.17.19  9:45 am   Do ninjas have mind-altering superpowers?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.17.19  9:07 am   how do i stop it

     step one you must identify it

6.17.19  8:55 am   Bill you haven't been active on your YouTube and Instagram, are you busy working on something big or are you taking a little break?

     i am busy working on something of a medium size

6.17.19  8:06 am   what is the earth shaped like?

     i assume it is cone shaped

6.17.19  7:48 am   are the signs on your wall (the 2 4 0 ones) just normal pieces of paper with those numbers printed on them or are they like. signs. just curious

     they seem to be cardboard. after re-arranging the existing numbers when i first got here (from 4 2 0 to 2 4 0), i noticed upon closer inspection that all 3 of them are actually flippable stacks, which would potentially enable me to change them to any numbers i wish. but i've kept it at 2 4 0, to reflect the original digits as i found them, although in a different order

6.17.19  7:38 am   Your opinion on whole wheat bread?

     tastes refreshing, like fresh brown grass

6.17.19  5:59 am   How is life going in general?

     ok

     Also what is life?

     it's like apples and oranges in a constant state of comparison

6.17.19  5:37 am   6.16.19  5:33 am - Thanks for answering this! I find it amazing how you can break this stuff down so easily. I've been playing music pretty consistently for around 15 years and I still couldn't nail what was going on there, especially the A+7(#9). Any tips on how to get better at breaking stuff like this down?

     experience with songs

      Do you literally rewind, listen, rewind, listen, until you've heard every note you think you can hear?

     do that when starting out, then after you've done 20 or 30 songs you will start to get what's going on. after 2000 songs you will even be able to predict what they do next

      Or does your perfect pitch give you the means to pick it apart super quickly?

     not even close. absolute pitch would actually be more of a distraction from anything musical

6.17.19  4:46 am   Why haven't you posted on youtube for a few months?

     because i'm making a video

6.17.19  3:34 am   how do you feel about the timeline of the far future 

     it is very unknown

6.17.19  2:49 am   which shrek movie is your favorite

      Shrekleback: the adventures of Chad Krogre

6.17.19  2:11 am   are you content with your "reality" at the moment?

     somewhat

6.17.19  2:07 am   do people ever tell you that you've helped them with depression or something similar?

     yes

6.17.19  1:30 am   I  believe my scheme is a good scheme would you belive me if my scheme was a sad glad scheme?

     which is it? you've contradicted yourself so far. nevermind, yes i believe you

6.17.19  1:13 am   if there's one thing that you've done that you want more people to know about, what is it? 

     wouldn't be 1. it would have to be a different number of things

6.17.19  1:13 am   thank you for doing what you're doing and being what you're being.  i appreciate the time you're spending right now learning new things and i am patiently excited for when i get to experience the new project.

     that's nice of you

6.17.19  12:48 am   When are we getting the velcro video?

     fuck velcro

6.17.19  12:20 am   do we exist

     does whom exist. nevermind, yes

     i'm not sure

6.16.19  11:27 pm   can you do a cover of just did a bad thing by bill wurtz

     sure

6.16.19  11:05 pm   Hnnng what's your opinion on America?

     sounds fictional

6.16.19  10:56 pm   why don't you talk about rap songs?

     why don't you notice when i do

      do you hate rap?

     no

6.16.19  9:25 pm   how do you think the universe will end

     could be interrupted by another universe

6.16.19  9:16 pm   would you enjoy eating a large amount of beans?

     over a long period of time i think it could be alright

6.16.19  9:13 pm   Are you feeling bad about not uploading videos that much?

     yes

6.16.19  8:28 pm   Why are some chords over another like C over D or something like that 

     my next question is have you heard that in a song before and was it good

     begin selling nuclear warfare merchandise
